events.message: I received the wrong product in my order and would like to request a refund as soon as possible because this item does not meet my needs.
The system has identified this issue as a refund request based on the keywords mentioned by the customer.
Assigning customer support agent Sarah to handle the refund case reported by the customer regarding the incorrect product delivery.
Hello! Thank you for contacting support. I'm sorry to hear about the incorrect product you received, and I'm here to assist you with your refund request.
Could you please provide your order number and a photo of the product you received? This will help us process your refund more quickly.
Sure, my order number is #452789 and I have attached a photo showing that the product is not what I ordered.
Thank you for the information. We will initiate a full refund to your original payment method and provide you with instructions to return the incorrect product.
That sounds great, thank you for the quick response and clear instructions. I appreciate your help resolving this matter.
We have processed your refund and sent you the return shipping label via email. Please let us know if you have any further questions.
Just checking in to confirm that you have received your refund and returned the product. Please contact us if you need any additional assistance.
As the refund has been successfully processed and the product returned, we are closing this case. Thank you for reaching out to us.
We have sent a short satisfaction survey to your email. We would appreciate your feedback on how we handled your refund request.
